name: two half ship
description:
A D for rotation  W  S up and down  , left click and J for  lift attack  , right click and l for  right attack 

make your ship with two half each half has it's own  properties , make the  strongest spaceship to get a high score 

build for  GMTK  game jam  by  

programers  (unkownzero itch.= fatehero(discord),(Mr mimla (itch,discord)
